name: Spirit Serpent's Swirl
description: When your Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when you switch your active character to one with Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent equipped: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2703]</color>, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when you switch your active character to one with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127032]</color> equipped: Deal 1 $[K107]. (Once per Round)

(Once per Round)
